commit.message:
Rustup and lazy_static version mismatch fix

fixes #2274

verification.payload:
tree a934696cc75a79e5d6cb55eb197663ab3cfae628
parent 86da435461522702bdc4967c6a69ec5f89a6721a
author Oliver Schneider <git-spam-no-reply9815368754983@oli-obk.de> 1513328559 +0100
committer Oliver Schneider <git-spam-no-reply9815368754983@oli-obk.de> 1513328732 +0100

Rustup and lazy_static version mismatch fix

fixes #2274

files.patch:
@@ -1,6 +1,9 @@
 # Change Log
 All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
 
+## 0.0.176
+* Rustup to *rustc 1.24.0-nightly (0077d128d 2017-12-14)*
+
 ## 0.0.175
 * Rustup to *rustc 1.24.0-nightly (bb42071f6 2017-12-01)*

@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 [package]
 name = "clippy"
-version = "0.0.175"
+version = "0.0.176"
 authors = [
 	"Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com>",
 	"Andre Bogus <bogusandre@gmail.com>",
@@ -37,15 +37,15 @@ path = "src/driver.rs"
 
 [dependencies]
 # begin automatic update
-clippy_lints = { version = "0.0.175", path = "clippy_lints" }
+clippy_lints = { version = "0.0.176", path = "clippy_lints" }
 # end automatic update
 cargo_metadata = "0.2"
 regex = "0.2"
 
 [dev-dependencies]
 compiletest_rs = "0.3"
 duct = "0.8.2"
-lazy_static = "0.2"
+lazy_static = "1.0"
 serde_derive = "1.0"
 clippy-mini-macro-test = { version = "0.1", path = "mini-macro" }
 serde = "1.0"

@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 [package]
 name = "clippy_lints"
 # begin automatic update
-version = "0.0.175"
+version = "0.0.176"
 # end automatic update
 authors = [
 	"Manish Goregaokar <manishsmail@gmail.com>",
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ keywords = ["clippy", "lint", "plugin"]
 
 [dependencies]
 itertools = "0.6.0"
-lazy_static = "0.2.8"
+lazy_static = "1.0"
 matches = "0.1.2"
 quine-mc_cluskey = "0.2.2"
 regex-syntax = "0.4.0"

@@ -129,6 +129,7 @@ impl<'a, 'tcx> LateLintPass<'a, 'tcx> for MissingDoc {
             hir::ItemStatic(..) => "a static",
             hir::ItemStruct(..) => "a struct",
             hir::ItemTrait(..) => "a trait",
+            hir::ItemTraitAlias(..) => "a trait alias",
             hir::ItemGlobalAsm(..) => "an assembly blob",
             hir::ItemTy(..) => "a type alias",
             hir::ItemUnion(..) => "a union",

@@ -940,6 +940,7 @@ pub fn opt_def_id(def: Def) -> Option<DefId> {
         Def::StructCtor(id, ..) |
         Def::Union(id) |
         Def::Trait(id) |
+        Def::TraitAlias(id) |
         Def::Method(id) |
         Def::Const(id) |
         Def::AssociatedConst(id) |
